scripts.publish:browser: yarn workspace @nocker/browser build && yarn workspace @nocker/browser publish --access=public
scripts.publish:chakra-ui: yarn workspace @nocker/chakra-ui build && yarn workspace @nocker/chakra-ui publish --access=public
scripts.publish:client: yarn workspace @nocker/client build && yarn workspace @nocker/client publish --access=public
scripts.publish:mui: yarn workspace @nocker/mui build && yarn workspace @nocker/mui publish --access=public
scripts.publish:react: yarn workspace @nocker/react build && yarn workspace @nocker/react publish --access=public
scripts.publish:vue: yarn workspace @nocker/vue build && yarn workspace @nocker/vue publish --access=public
scripts.render:storybook:chakra-ui: rm package.json && cd packages/chakra-ui && yarn install && yarn build:storybook
scripts.render:storybook:mui: rm package.json && cd packages/mui && yarn install && yarn build:storybook
scripts.render:storybook:react: rm package.json && cd packages/react && yarn install && yarn build:storybook
